sn32.54:1.2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn32.54:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā uṇhaṁ hotī”ti?
sn32.54:1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṁ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṁ taṁ cetopaṇidhimanvāya uṇhaṁ hoti.
sn32.54:1.7: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yenekadā uṇhaṁ hotī”ti.
